website_summaries.verdict: A bargain for a real down vest that’s lightweight, durable, slender, and stylish.
pros: This vest features a nylon shell and lining, and 90 percent duck down insulation
Stretch arm holes and raised collar are nice features
Compacts nicely into an included carry pouch
cons: Not as warm as goose down vests

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: For what you paid this is a great product! I own a $200 North F**e full jacket(not a vest) that have a super similar construction, feel and quality. Probably the $200 have better materials for some special weather conditions that I will prob never see. But since they are both made in china, I now feel like a fool for spending 200 on something that I could have gotten for much less.
customer_reviews.author: S. Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Warm, well-made, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this vest. He wears a size Large in all of his shirts; he's 5'9", 175lbs, 42" chest. This vest fit perfectly. Loose enough to wear a tee shirt and a flannel shirt under the vest. Length is good hitting him at his hipbone. He said it kept him very warm without feeling "bundled up" yet it's lightweight enough to put a jacket over the vest for walking our dog this evening with the temp in the upper 30s.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, light and warm.  Zipper (as many have said) is "borderline"
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest overall. It is soft, comfortable, light weight, and easily packed. It has exterior zip pockets, and comes with a bag into which the vest can be folded and stuffed. My only gripe is the base of the zipper. It is difficult to make the initial connection where the tip of one side goes into the zipper and base of the other side. Once you accomplish this, the zipper works just like it should, but if you don't get it right then the bottom can separate and "strand" the zipper itself. If the zipper was replaced by a better quality (larger toothed) zipper, this would be 5 stars,
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L (FL)

customer_reviews.title: Bought an extra large.  Extremely small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL. Typically these should run a little large to fit over clothing. Tried it on and there was no way I could even zip it, even in just a t-shirt. Appeared to be a Medium even though it was tagged as an XL. I immediately returned it. And no. I am not that large (6'1" 190 lbs 36 inch waist) well withing the XL size chart. I only buy extra large because the fit is more comfortable across the shoulders. Maybe it was a fluke and got the wrong tag at the factory. Most others seem to be quite satisfied with the fit. Sorry XPOSURZONE, I didn't really want to take a second chance.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cason

customer_reviews.title: jacket is warm and fits fine, but the pocket zippers are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this vest daily for the past 6 months and as far as comfort, warmth, portability go, it's excellent and there is certainly a reason I wear it almost everyday. It occured to me however, that after 6 months of nearly daily pocket zipper jams (the pocket zipper gets caught on the fabric wayyyy tooo easy), perhaps there is a better solution out there. I recently purchased the Uniqlo version of this vest and it does NOT suffer from this pocket zipper problem. I should have paid the extra $10 initially and gotten the better quality jacket rather than try to save $10 for an inferior product. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Vest is well made and a great price for a down vest. Nice fabric, nice zippers. There are two inside pockets plus the two outside zipper pockets. I got this to wear inside when I feel cold and it will work well because it is light weight and roomy enough to fit over a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Henri

customer_reviews.title: Warm and lightweight, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I returned the vest for 2 reasons- it had a funky odor reminiscent of sweaty kids after playing hard outside. No lie! That’s the description my wife gave it. Not sure why- and it was subtle but nonetheless off-putting. Second reason was the zipper- first time I tried it on the zipper pulled apart on the bottom. And it just felt flimsy. It pulled apart several times I’ve the few days I tried out the vest. Upside- it was warm enough for a 40+ degree day and super lightweight. Maybe the odor was a fluke but the zipper issue prompted the return.
customer_reviews.author: Kenalex

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add an additional thermal layer while i was backpacking in France. Its great and light, packs down really well. The only issues i have is that it seemed thinner than i expected and didn't offer less thermal layer than i wanted. But for the price i paid i really cant complain. For this price it worked perfectly! I wish they had one just like this but packed twice as much down in it.
customer_reviews.author: Spikes2020

customer_reviews.title: Just received...I hope the four stars will be a fair assessment, if not low
customer_reviews.text: Order filled promptly. Product was as described. Have only tried on and found it acceptable, but a bit snug...though that could have been a result of Thanksgiving. I’ve read some negatives about the zipper. How it holds up we will see. I would have paid a little more to have a more substantial zipper, but time will tell on durability. Out of the gate, this vest seems great for my purposes and represents a good value. I hope the four star rating will be worthy of the product after some use. Update12/18/19: Unfortunately, after two wearings, previous reviews as to zipper breaking happened and item has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lick

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: The materials are great and feel like a quality product. Have to admit I was a bit surprised for the low price. Down is good quality and keeps you toasty warm. A few tiny feathers can make their way but that is normal. Colors really pop (I bought a blue and orange one) and have had lots of complimenst from my friends who spent 4x more for something similar from MEC (in Canada).
customer_reviews.author: CalgaryBuyer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 stylish, comfortable, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandpa who normally wears an XL and it fit wonderfully and it's the only vest he wears now. He loves how leightweight it is too so he doesn't have to lug a heavy vest or coat with his cane. 10/10 stylish, comfortable, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Just received down vest and really like it. It appears to be very well made ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received down vest and really like it. It appears to be very well made and I like the fit and light weight of the vest. Like the two outside zipper pockets, plus the inside pockets. It's what I hoped for, but quality of vest is better than I expected. The service and quick delivery were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: bronc jakesen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely vest; faulty zip
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lightweight vest but the zip was faulty. One side wouldn’t seat properly into the bottom of the zip holder. Finally fixed it by prising open the gap a little more with a small screwdriver but it still needs wiggling to make it sit properly. I am overseas and too much hassle to sent it back. Apart from the zip the vest itself is great. The zip needs to be less flimsy and more robust
customer_reviews.author: Roimata Mete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Bought another one I liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Bought another one I liked it so much. I'm 6' 205#. Little bit of the ol beer belly. A large fit perfect. Material is really nice and it's actually warm for how light it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mayes

customer_reviews.title: Great value beats name brands
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for the price. Fits as expected. Got a medium I'm 6ft 185lb. 650 fill power and 90% down filling. Lightweight and warm. Will probably buy another. Quality zippers and stitching. Can't go wrong at this price.
customer_reviews.author: G. P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but leaks?
customer_reviews.text: I wore this vest over a long sleeve tee all last week. Temps were in the 40s and 50s. Chest stayed warm in activities. Fit is a little snug, But i wanted that for layering. Looks nice, stitching is nice, but holy feather leaks batman! Everytime I took this thing off there was down on my chest and shoulders. Just a heads up, cause this certainly isn’t down proof materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Craft

customer_reviews.title: Fits and as described
customer_reviews.text: I like layers to adjust to temperature and activity. I hike and backpack this is light, warm and packs small, all important. I also play pickleball outdoors and mornings in Phoenix in winter can be cold. I like the warmth and flexibility of the vest as another layer.
customer_reviews.author: albert pozar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS ONE OF THOSE LAST MINUTE, GOTTA HAVE THINGS. AMAZON CAME THROUGH IN ST PLACE AS ALWAYS. JUST A BIT ON THE LARGE SIEZE. I AM USUALLY A LG, BUT THIS BEING AN OUTSIDE VEST, I WENT FOR THE XLG. IF I LAYERED MY SHIRTS AS I SHOULD, THIS WOULD FIT TO THE "T"! NO COMPALINTS HERE ON THE WHOLE PACKAGE! HAPPY HOLIDAYS TO ALL AND TO ALL A GOOD NIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: JEPix

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of worried that the vest would be as cheap as the price. Not so! Seems to be high quality. Fits well. Very light and space saving. Can be compressed to about softball size. The pockets are very deep and warm. The collar is high and fits perfectly and is neither too tight or too loose. It's pretty nice looking too. The only problem is the zippers tend to get stuck on fabric and jammed. If you can remember to zip and unzip slowly, the problem is solved. This is a perfect thing to have in your backpack to provide additional warmth. Don't be afraid of the price. One of the best deals I've gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Philotus

customer_reviews.title: I've had mine for several weeks and, the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for several weeks and, the zipper didn't work for several uses. The zipper either bound or was VERY difficult to zip. I would consider a more expensive puff vest if I'd taken more time to research other manufacturers. ONE star due to quality. Now, the zipper on the left pocket grabbed the lining along the zipper and pulled it into the zipper mechanism. The zipper completely split apart. TERRIBLE product.
customer_reviews.author: Markdb56

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for I guess... Pocket zippers constantly get caught up in the fabric and the stuffing is constantly popping through the fabric as well. It was cheap to purchase and it is a cheaply made. Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great, warm vest. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: There were so many to choose from. I selected this one for the style and price. I found it to be very light weight and warm. It smushes down to fit in the little bag that comes with it, for easy storage. It has two, side zippered pockets and two inner pockets. The front zipper is easy and durable. The most surprising feature about this vest? The light weight. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this vest as soon as I put it on. If was very soft, comfortable, and warm. I like the fact that it came with a bag so that I could roll it up and pack it. I bought one of a different color; and will buy some other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight vest is just perfect for Fall days here in Minnesota. And I expect it to be the same for Winter days in California. We go for early morning walks and it should be just right. It is incredibly lighweight, too.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It is a little bit smaller than his old one but still fit comfortably. Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vest to substitute my husband's old vest by free country , which he burned with the cigarette. Odered same size and was very impressed with the quality of the product, especially for the price paid. It is a little bit smaller than his old one but still fit comfortably. Very light weight, solid material and overall construction. Would recommend to anyone who likes to stay warm without wearing bulky clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Kleyman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Item..
customer_reviews.text: Not what I exspected was (Cream) not "White" as advertised. Tried on vest went to open zipper and it broke. Very disappointed will be returning item.
customer_reviews.author: A Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Size up. Maybe 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.text: The vest appears to be a nice vest, however it is too small. I normally wear an XL just fine, but I read that these run a little small so I ordered an XXL. Well, even it is snug, and that's the largest size available. I'm not that big. The sizing these days is getting pretty crazy. I'll probably end up giving it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good white but good value
customer_reviews.text: If this were a true white, it'd be so perfect, but it's not. Whites are tough so I am not angry with anyone, it's just not the shade I was hoping for. The price was good enough to keep the vest and throw it my outdoor/soccer bag in the car. That is a compliment for sure.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this vest
customer_reviews.text: Love to be able to shop on Amazon and find what would take hours to shop for. My husband does not do shopping at all!! This vest came in the color he preferred and price was right because he will wear it seldom
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great orange/red vest.
customer_reviews.text: The red on the jacket is very much more orange. And there is a hole the pocket that lets the down out. On a positive note, I was lost in a department store and my wife was able track me down by following the trail of down and I was easy to see with my orange hue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: A favorite in my winter wardrobe. Zippers occasionally fail, though.
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning of winter, this has become something I don daily. It must be my favorite garment for the season. I have washed and dried it once, and it turned out well. The only problem as been the zippers. The pocket zippers tend to catch the neighboring fabric, and the main front zipper has twice come partially unzipped causing that tedious problem of working things back into their proper state.
customer_reviews.author: David Neff

customer_reviews.title: The Layerer's Keystone
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, packable, invaluable core-keeper. It's weight and packability make it a negligible addition to any pack for what it does. Also used for work, a professional setting that gets a bit chilly, and looks good with a shirt and tie... I just call it my Marty McFly look...
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: A fraction of the cost of other packable down garments
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, I love this vest. A fraction of the cost of my Mountain Hardware Ghost Whisperer jacket and weighs about the same. Same super-soft material. Using it for winter hiking, winter hammock camping sleep clothes, lounging around the house... and probably everything else, too.
customer_reviews.author: ETNRedClay

customer_reviews.title: Very light vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest was very lightweight, which is ok for Texas. However, the vest was too small. I ordered an X-Large, which is hubby's normal size and this was too tight. It could be closed but was too tight to be comfortable. The return was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: TXSandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Marty McFly costume, and it worked perfectly. Not only does it look good, it’s very nice to just feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is bit smaller than expected, although I'm coming to expect this from any clothing made in China. Otherwise, so far it's OK. Not too small to wear, but not as an outer garment unless it's with nothing bulkier than a light shirt underneath. It will work well under a coat. Comes with a handy little bag you can stuff it into.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Compact and the perfect weight
customer_reviews.text: This packable down vest was perfect for my trip to Morocco. I had checked the weather before leaving and it was forecast to be cool. This vest was just what I needed. I could wear it under a windbreaker for those colder nights in the desert and with a shirt if it was just a bit cool. I would have given this 5 stars but the zippers on the pockets kept getting caught on the fabric along the zipper's edge. Even with this small inconvenience, it was still an excellent choice for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, it is very lightweight. Therefore very packable. Adds some warmth when worn under an outercoat. Not enough warmth to wear alone at say 30F/0C. Construction is OK, not top notch. Will try to update review after the winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Semmelweis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight but still warm enough that I can be quite comfortable without another layer on top. Packs down to a very small size. Perfect for my life and style!
customer_reviews.author: Palouse

customer_reviews.title: Not a well made product that came with holes, sticking pocket zippers, no tag.
customer_reviews.text: Came with 1 big hole & a few tiny holes with down protruding through. The pocket zippers constantly get caught in material. It seems it was in used condition with no tags.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It was slightly small but fits. Kind of thinner then I expected too but seems warm so I don't mind. Sometimes a few feathers escape if I wear it under other jackets but I've never seen anything down that doesn't sometimes do that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: neither pocket zipper works
customer_reviews.text: Vest has two pockets with zippers, both jam every time you attempt to open them. I’m very disappointed, only wore it twice in the first few months. Now it’s too late to return it. I’d give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, did not have to go up a size or down a size. It is snug, but not tight or restricted in any way. Very pleasing color. Just the right level of puffiness. For the price I paid, I’m very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: T. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Warm light weight down vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lightweight down vest. It adds warmth when worn over clothes and adds protection from the wind. It is thin enough to be worn under another jacket. It packs into its little bag when traveling. My husband is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: JFR

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Very light easy to compress a great great value I'm sure it would not hold up with daily use in the wild Outdoors but it sure good enough for the urban environment moving from the car I like wearing it in the car where it's easy to overheat in a heavy jacket
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.text: Returned, sure wasn't what I expected. Very, very light and felt like no down.
customer_reviews.author: casper

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and is nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is nice and warm. It's extremely lightweight which is great as I'm recovering from rotator cuff surgery and can't have anything too heavy on my shoulder, so it's been hard to stay warm when it's 20 degrees outside. Only problem I'm having is a year later, the zipper splits and won't stay zipped.
customer_reviews.author: L. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so well I bought another one to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it so well I bought another one to keep in my car in case of emergencies. The Zipper pulled apart the second time I wore it but I got it unstuck and the zipper has functioned fine ever since. I've worn it almost every day for a month and it's been fine. It's warm and is thin enough to layer under another coat on really cold days.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: A well made down vest with a better than average zipper. Includes a stuff sack and two outer and two inner pockets. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AET

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price fo sho!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ultralight and super warm. Looks cool too! Had concerns about the zippers from previous reviews, but they work flawlessly. Deep inside pockets and big outside pockets with zipper closure, provide plenty of room for a phablet or whatever. Great quality vest for $30.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser13

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. I am 5'8", 200lbs, and i ordered the XL. Fits great. If you are any bigger than me though, make sure to get the XXL. I feel like it runs a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Size is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson. I ordered an M because of other reviews but it was way too small. I exchanged it for an XXL and he loves the fit. I also exchanged it blue for chocolate. Perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 Down Vest I've bought
customer_reviews.text: If you are gentle with zipper, stows small, fluffs up easy and adds warmth. Buy one size bigger than usual. Not waterproof and nylon is fragile, so put windbreaker or jacket over or be careful.
customer_reviews.author: sailormanTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and love the brand
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and love the brand. Athout I am medium I ended up ordering a large based on the revies. It appears to be running smaller than it should. I still can use it as it is not too tied. Recommend a side up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Malaret

customer_reviews.title: XL far too small.  Nice mid-weight puffer vest. Looking forward to getting the correct size when it returns to stock.
customer_reviews.text: I own a dozen down/puffer and fleece vests. This is by fall the smallest XL of any brand. It is thinly insulated compared to other down vests. This looks like a great shoulder season or layering vest. FYI the zippers are not contrasting, they are the same color as vest. It comes with a stuff sack, but does not have a drawstring at the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Hiker

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, looks good. Gave it four instead of five stars because it is a little lighter than I would have hoped. Therefore not quite the warming power. Still, very happy with the purchase and would recommend. Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: great vest runs small
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and got it as large as it came but was too small. Hubby normally wears XL and I bought this as XXXL was still too small, but it did fit my son who wears a M/Lg and it was great. Good quality for the price and very warm. Wish it had fit but my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and look of this microfiber fabric
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of this microfiber fabric. Maybe has a little bit more down than other brands. Well made and should last a long time with care. Definitely stay away from campfires if there are any sparks--as I found out the hard way with a previous, now patched vest !!
customer_reviews.author: estoer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for this price!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with the fit and detailing of this vest. Seems to be good quality except for the zipper which doesn’t seem like it will last. We’ll see. Has inside pockets that he really likes. Outside pockets are lined with a soft fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Pina

customer_reviews.title: Fits my somewhat large belly
customer_reviews.text: Like the coat. Since I live in the Southwest it is warm enough. Feels good, looks good. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Ok yet a little tight
customer_reviews.text: it appears to be well made. it is on the tight side and I would buy one size larger in hindsight
customer_reviews.author: SKNiemi

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Issue
customer_reviews.text: Sizing an issue. I suggest ordering one size larger than you normally do
customer_reviews.author: cazguy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what I paid. Not a ton of loft but I didn’t expect that. Durability may be an issue long term but will be a great extra layer to stuff in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan_H

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vest, especially prices and 100% down not polyester like others.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I though it would be a bit warmer than it is. Wish it were a bit warmer! Trevor
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very warm
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is the best vest I’ve owned. Actually it’s just the best vest I’ve owned period, and the cheap price is just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: N8ure

customer_reviews.title: Just the right warmth for me - and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I lost it. I will buy another in a second if it becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bear

customer_reviews.title: light down vest
customer_reviews.text: very light and not bulky under a heavier jacket, without a jacket it still keeps you warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mens lighweight down vest
customer_reviews.text: Light weight easily packable, however not a large size that you would typically find in the U.S.
customer_reviews.author: Beesforme

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but somewhat big
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice. Over all nice vest, but runs a bit to big for my taste
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Zindel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice as XXL and both times it arrived as M. The second time I looked for verification of the size in the description and no size info was available. I specifically watched to make sure the XXL box was highlighted both time! I am very disappounted. Now I have to pay to return items...twice!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware, manufactured small
customer_reviews.text: I wear XL. To have something be said to be that size and slightly too small is annoying. No I’m not larger. My other XL vests fit fine
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: packs very small and works good
customer_reviews.text: I ride a motorcycle and keep this in the saddle bag to add a nice layer if the cold sneaks up on me. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Great for layering
customer_reviews.text: Very thin shell, but not a negative for me as it appears tough enough. Fits perfectly — true to size. Great for layering. Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: JoPob

customer_reviews.title: Back to the Future
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to dress as Marty McFly from Back to the Future and it looks perfect
customer_reviews.author: Josh H.

customer_reviews.title: Super light weigh and comfortable Down Vest
customer_reviews.text: Super light weigh and comfortable Down Vest, takes very little space after being folded, very good price as comparing with other similar products, pretty satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Love To Share

customer_reviews.title: zipper broke first use.  the fit was small.
customer_reviews.text: fit was too small. and the zipper broke first time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nocella

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a light vest
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. The color seemed almost white in the photos when I ordered. It's actually somewhere between light gray and silver, which is fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ivers

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The color looks pretty close to black but because it isn't, the price was a lot lower ($19.99). Fits great and the price can't be beat. I wear the vest with thermal henleys.
customer_reviews.author: Casual golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for what it was purchased for. The zippers on the pockets are a little tough, otherwise I could've given it a 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: HairKC

customer_reviews.title: my husband and son are not the kind of person that like to uses jackets
customer_reviews.text: It was buy for a trip , my husband and son are not the kind of person that like to uses jackets , we were going to a high altitude place very cold at night so ,I buy this at lease not to worry they cach a pulmonary sickness , they love it

product_meta.description:
XPOSURZONE Men Packable Down Puffer Vest

About XPOSURZONE 
XPOSURZONE is a professional manufacturer of cold weather outwear, especially ultralight down jackets. We produce a wide range of jackets, vests, blankets, and other cold weather apparel, using the best quality, highest performing materials. Our premium down is incredibly lofty, weighs practically nothing, and amazingly compressible. The shells are made of lightweight nylon, so they are weather resistant and silky smooth. We put the stylish touch on practical pieces, so you will look fashionable as well as feeling warm and cozy.

Product Details 
A thin, light, and warm down vest for men. The slim collar is made with less down, and fits your neck closely to keep drafts out. Stretch armholes add comfort and fit. The slender, stylish cut is great for layering over a shirt or hoodie, or under a coat or jacket without the bulk. Pack it down compactly into an included carrying pouch so you can take it with you everywhere you go. Suitable for outside activities: golf,hiking,climbing,traveling,riding,driving,walking,casual and sportswear.
